recipeInstructions.text: Preheat oven to 400F. Combine flour, baking powder, and salt in large bowl; cut in butter with a pastry blender until it resembles a coarse meal. Chill ofr 10 minutes.
Combine buttermilk and honey, stirring with a whisk until blended. Add buttermilk to flour mixture; stir just until moist.

Turn dough out on a lightly floured surface; knead lightly 4 times. Roll dough into a 9 x 5 x 1/2 inch rectangle; dust top of dough with flour. Fold dough crosswise into thirds. Re-roll dough into same rectangle. Dust again. Repeat that again, folding the other direction.
Cut 3 x 5 to form 15 rounds. Place 1 inch apart on a large baking sheet lined with parchment paper. Bake at 400F for 12 minutes or until golden. Remove from pan; cool 2 minutes and serve warm.
